task_background: Prepare the high-end automotive workshop and showroom for an exclusive client event, ensuring all displays are operational, vehicles are properly positioned, and VIP areas are fully stocked.

tasks.task_description: Place the signed Schumacher helmet (schumacher_helmet_1) on the touchscreen kiosk (touchscreen_kiosk_1).
Turn on the rotating display platform (rotating_platform_1).
Find the motor oil with the highest fill level and place it on the oil drip pan (oil_drip_pan_1).
Find the only flickering spotlight in the main showroom and turn it off.
Use the water purification filter (water_filter_1) to purify the water in the espresso machine (espresso_machine_1).
Use the scrub brush (scrub_brush_1) and detailing spray (detailing_spray_1) to clean the Porsche 911 GT3 RS (porsche_911_1).
Find the only wireless charging pad with an error state and fix it by turning it off and on again.
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the locked display drawer (locked_drawer_1).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 work together to lower the hydraulic lift (hydraulic_lift_1).
Move the Ford GT engine block (engine_block_1) to the diagnostic bay.
Move the parts storage shelf (parts_shelf_1) to the workshop office.
Cooperatively move the industrial pressure washer (pressure_washer_1) to the diagnostic bay and turn it on.
